review: works great. There is one thing I don't like about it. Its hard to make it 4 stars over it but when you voice search within Netflix it doesn't search within netfix. It searches all for the movie or show I voice search for it should search within Netflix if I am already in Netflix. I could see it searching for all if I am at the main menu but it should search within what ever app I am currently in.
author: jd

review: Awesome machine...Streams movies and shows very nicely.  Games are very entertaining and fun.  The just updated USB Storage feature so additional storage is nice.  Only thing I do not like is that the Music section is still unavailable, but sure that will be opened up sometime in the near future.  Both remote and Gamepad work great and are very responsive.  Voice search is nice for Amazon, too bad it doesn't work for other services like Netflix.  Goes great with Prime membership and finally able to use Amazon Coins for purchasing apps.  Picture and sound are great on our Sony 60" TV..very happy with this addition to our home entertainment...Planning on buying 2 more for living room and daughters room.
author: ultra55371

review: I bought this for Amazon movies and MLB TV. Amazon works brilliantly. MLB is pretty much awful. Would have got the Roku instead next time and probably still will because the MLB App is so poor. It's crashed and even has bugs that makes it impossible to watch a game. I've called MLB but it's really not their fault. My old Roku still plays those games fine but the video quality is poor due to the age of the Roku.
